message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. However, I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Dear Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. We appreciate your interest in our product and would like to make a proposal that we believe is beneficial for both parties. We are willing to consider a price of $900000 for the product. We hope this offer aligns more closely with what you're looking for.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to consider my previous counteroffer. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise.

Dear Bob, thank you for your latest counteroffer. We understand your position and would like to propose a price of $890000 for the product. We believe this offers a reasonable compromise while still maintaining a fair profit margin for us. We hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Dear Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go a bit further and offer $870000 for the product. I believe this is the best we can do without going over my budget.

Dear Bob, thank you for your continued engagement in this negotiation. We've carefully considered your most recent offer and are pleased to present a counteroffer of $880000 for the product. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our respective positions, allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while staying within your budget constraints.

Dear Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one final offer of $860000 for the product. I believe this is the best we can do without going over my budget, and I hope you can meet me halfway.

Dear Bob, thank you for your final offer. We've taken into account all the considerations during this negotiation and are pleased to propose a price of $875000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise, taking into account both our profit margins and your budget constraints. We hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Dear Alice, I'm disappointed that we couldn't come to an agreement at this point. However, I'm willing to make one last attempt to reach a compromise. I'm willing to offer $850000 for the product, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider purchasing the product from John for $800000.
